g.G235: properly, other things, i.e. (adverbially) contrariwise (in many relations)
g.G4183: (singular) much (in any respect) or (plural) many; neuter (singular) as adverbial, largely; neuter (plural) as adverb or noun often, mostly, largely
g.G2443: compare G3588 (ὁ)); in order that (denoting the purpose or the result)
g.G4982: to save, i.e. deliver or protect (literally or figuratively)
